column8:
Yoga
I have just started Yoga recently. My body is not flexible so I do very badly but at the same time it makes me feel good after the class. This t shirt shows 7 chakra in the body. They are the energy center in the body receipting and  transmitting the energies. Through Yoga practice releasing these points, we aim to reach energy in universe. So far I am not get it at all, but I am hoping one day I would be able to get spiritual answers through Yoga!!
column21: A special t shirt from weadmire.net in celebration of Yoga.
